patthana17.1:2.1_0: Kusalaṁ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.1:2.1_1: Kusalaṁ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe…
patthana17.1:2.1_2: kusalaṁ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca naakusalo
patthana17.1:2.1_3: nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … pañca.

patthana17.1:4.1_2: Abyākataṁ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca naakusalo
patthana17.1:4.1_3: nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana17.1:5.1_0: Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate terasa.
